text: Arasesata sihamte te'omra prati micha araopa karaile; phalata ami te'omka arau te'omra saite yisakale naramta araohana karaichila te'omlokaka najata dilo arau te'omlokaka sthalabhisikta karailo; arau yisakale amara ayatasamuhaka asbikara karaichila sihamtaka duba'i marailo. Gatike coraa, yisakalaka satarka karaa haichila sihamtara kenekuraa parainama haichila
